readme:
# Deep-C-syntax theme

An Atom syntax highlighting based on a deep sea color palette. Made to bring out the beautiful contrasts in the colors of the sea.

The color palette consists of almost 30 colors and currently highlights only a few languages:

#### C

![C syntax highlighting](screenshots/c-highlighting.png)

#### HTML

![HTML syntax highlighting](screenshots/html-highlighting.png)

#### CSS

![CSS syntax highlighting](screenshots/css-highlighting.png)

#### JavaScript

![JavaScript syntax highlighting](screenshots/js-highlighting.png)
